ModMetaData.name: KCSG Unbound
ModMetaData.author: TeH_Dav
ModMetaData.description:
KCSG Unbound is a mod for the Vanilla Expanded Framework KCSG module designed to overcome the 65,535 symbol limit by implementing a shadow registry system. This allows for virtually unlimited symbols in your structure generation, enabling much larger and more complex settlements, faction bases, and other structures.
Features: - Seamlessly integrates with existing VEF KCSG - Transparently handles symbols beyond the 65,535 limit - No performance impact for normal usage - Compatible with most mods that use KCSG
Required Dependencies: - Harmony - Zetrith's Prepatcher (for early loading patches)
